name: Manny The Armadillo - Saves The World
name_original: Manny The Armadillo - Saves The World
description:
I was solo developing "Manny the Armadillo" and stoped due to work.  Since I didn't want it to die and be forgotten, I uploaded it to Itch.io.  My objective for this game was to fuse Mario64 and Mini Golf.  

If this game gets some traction, I plan on creating at least 8 worlds with their on themes; Fire, Ice, Carnaval, etc... I would also create 3-5 level in each world. I have already developed most of the mechanics for the game, including 5 power ups that the player would unlock throughout the game. There is also a real wacky backstory that fits perfect for the game (at least in my head :) 

Thanks For Playing!!!
